method.name: i_cal_period_get_start
method.comment: Gets the start time from an #ICalPeriod.

method.name: i_cal_period_set_start
method.comment: Sets the start time of an #ICalPeriod.

method.name: i_cal_period_get_end
method.comment: Gets the end time from an #ICalPeriod.

method.name: i_cal_period_set_end
method.comment: Sets the end time of an #ICalPeriod.

method.name: i_cal_period_get_duration
i_cal_period_set_duration

parameter.name: str
parameter.comment: The string used to create the #ICalPeriod

returns.comment: true if yes, false if not.
true if yes, false if not.
